name: Fort Raiders: Another Kings Fight
description:
Fort Raiders: Another Kings Fight

One player must take over the fort of his opponent in an epic raid before the time runs out. 

Call your people to arms, assemble your army and gather all the enchanted creatures of your kingdom under your banner. 

Purchase powerful combat features, upgrade your troops and win this fight! Or die standing!

  • Jonathan Lauzon - Sound Designer
  • John Barry - UI/UX Designer
  • Kym Hogan - Programming
  • Marianne Nobert - Character Design
  • Roxanne Corbeil - Programming
  • Samuel Trottier - Programming

Ubisoft Creative Game Jam - 2018
